attributes.action: stop, immediately, funding of political party activists with taxpayer pounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent revelations make it clear that the taxpayer is taken for GBP1.7 billion to pay for party political activities between general elections.  Taxpayers have no choice over which party the money goes to and therefore it is misappropriation and should be make illegal.  The voter MUST be given an opportunity to say whether or not taxpayer pounds should go to political activists who strive only to improve their own status and do NOTHING for the status of the taxpayer.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
